players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana was killed on the first night. With only 3 of us left, we need to be very careful with our vote today. I think we should each share our thoughts on who might be the mafioso."
Bob: "I agree with Alice; we need to discuss carefully. I'm just a regular villager and don't have any clues yet. What about you, Charlie?"

You: "Charlie, you cut off mid-sentence. We need to hear what you were going to say. With Diana dead and only 3 of us left, every word matters. Bob claims to be a villager like me, so one of you two must be the..."
Bob: "Charlie, your silence is really suspicious with Diana gone. We need to hear from you before voting."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
